public interface GordianRandomFactory

    • listAllSupportedRandomSpecs

      List<GordianRandomSpec> listAllSupportedRandomSpecs(GordianRandomType pType, GordianLength pKeyLen)
      Obtain a list of supported randomSpecs of a given type and keyLength.

      Only valid for CTR And X931 types

      Parameters:
      pType - the random type
      pKeyLen - the keyLength
      Returns:
      the list of supported randomSpecs.
